title: Managing Application Releases Using Helm
description: Deploy an application using Helm, perform configuration changes, and safely rollback in a shared Kubernetes environment.

steps.title: Deploy the chart to the cluster and verify the release, along with all associated pods and services
Upgrade the chart configuration, then inspect the changes and troubleshoot any issues
Roll back the release to the previous stable version
Remove the release and clean up all associated resources from the cluster.
